description: {"blocks":[{"key":"d1o7g","text":"This SOP defines the methods used by the Vanderbilt Diabetes Center Islet and Pancreas Analysis (IPA) Core for static incubation of pancreatic islets isolated from mouse or human tissue. steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fqvo1","text":"RPMI with 5.6 mM glucose (cell culture media):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8iap3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"86d47","text":"Remove 5 mL from a 500 mL bottle of RPMI, and add 5 mL penicillin/streptomycin. Close bottle and invert to mix.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"40qgg","text":"Add 0.505 g glucose to RPMI, invert to mix, and incubate at room temperature for   to allow glucose to go into solution.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":81,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"baphi","text":"In a BSL-2 culture hood, vacuum filter 450 mL RPMI.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8bdij","text":"Add 50 mL FBS.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7uva7","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7m2u3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2gale","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"9297FDE056D511ECA2CDE7C7E90CDC3A","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":34}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6lhv","text":"Once made, media can be stored at   for up to 1 month.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"75BA13E056D311ECA2CDE7C7E90CDC3A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10},"mutability":"","type":"temperature"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"buu09","text":"DMEM (static incubation media):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9r5j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"feqsn","text":"Add the following ingredients into a 1 L Erlenmeyer flask.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2qjsk","text":"8.28 g DMEM","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f9qsk","text":"3.2 g sodium bicarbonate","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7d7j5","text":"0.58 g L-gutamine","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d9sje","text":"1.11 g HEPES","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3jtv7","text":"0.11 g sodium pyruvate","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"76g35","text":"1 g bovine serum albumin","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ff4av","text":"70 mg ascorbate","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e23l","text":"1 L deionized water","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fms9g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eam2r","text":"Place a stir bar into the flask and situate on top of a magnetic stir plate. Stir at medium-high speed for   to allow all ingredients to go into solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":107,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"9E53882056D511ECA2CDE7C7E90CDC3A","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7v3dj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"79pcq","text":"Aliquot 500 mL of DMEM media into each of 2 plastic storage bottles to make 5.6 mM glucose and 16.7 mM glucose solutions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"59cap","text":"DMEM with 5.6 mM glucose:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":25}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fh5ru","text":"Add 0.505 g glucose to 500 mL prepared DMEM media.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8br0h","text":"Incubate for   to allow glucose to go into solution.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":13,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1e7cd","text":"Vacuum-filter media.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"055A442056D411ECA2CDE7C7E90CDC3A","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1vfpl","text":"DMEM with 16.7 mM glucose:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":26}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c1flm","text":"Add 1.504 g glucose to 500 mL prepared DMEM media.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cocti","text":"Incubate for   to allow glucose to go into solution.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":13,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3vum0","text":"Vacuum-filter media.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"20615D3056D411ECA2CDE7C7E90CDC3A","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8kml","text":"Acid ethanol (for hormone extraction):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":38}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5lg61","text":"Pipet 5.5 mL 95% ethanol into a 15 mL conical tube.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3jd7g","text":"Add 50µL hydrochloric acid.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"65ipu","text":"Invert to mix.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9u270","text":"Pipet 5 mL RPMI with 5.6 mM glucose into each of two 6-cm cell culture dishes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":11,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eajrh","text":"Using an electronic pipette and an inverted microscope, pass islets into the first plate, and then into the second.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"de73k","text":"Place islets into a   cell culture incubator with 5% CO2 and leave overnight for a minimum of  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":55,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":94,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"emov2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"EA2D3FA056EB11ECA2CDE7C7E90CDC3A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":64800,"guid":"CA4908A0589811ECAD79917AB54C5834","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9vf1m","text":"Pipet 5 mL of DMEM with 5.6 mM glucose into a 6-cm cell culture dish.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":25}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7js2n","text":"Label a 12-well plate for static incubation according to your experimental design. In the example below, two conditions are shown, low glucose (5.6 mM) and high glucose (16.7 mM). These conditions can be repeated in subsequent rows and/or plates for biological replicates as desired.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cgri1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1kkg5","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"A6D7CB20585411ECAD79917AB54C5834","height":355.9999999999999,"id":198464,"is_video":false,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":58,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"fpa7m","text":"Figure 1: Example schematic of a 12-well incubation plate.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"IPA-protocols_2_12well-plate copy.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gb4cbnyjx.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gb4abnyjx.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gb4bbnyjx.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gb39bnyjx.webp","width":448.0549199084667}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cp5ud","text":"Pipet 2 mL of the appropriate media into each well. Note that each condition requires two wells, a \"wash\" well and an \"incubation\" well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":62,"length":33}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1uaps","text":"Under microscope guidance, place around 20 islet equivalents (IEQs) into each wash well. This is typically a combination of 12 small, 5 medium, and 2 large islets. Use the chart below to measure islet sizes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6mdvt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e7grs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2g45o","text":"      ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"83ss5","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e9pkl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"8649C410589711ECAD79917AB54C5834","height":177.16363636363639,"id":198468,"is_video":false,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":90,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"4mfed","text":"Figure 2: A reticle is used to IEQ islets and aliquot them into 12-well incubation plates.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"IPA-protocols_2_IEQ-reticle.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gb4gbnyjx.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gb4ebnyjx.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gb4fbnyjx.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gb4dbnyjx.webp","width":580}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":16,"offset":65,"style":"bold"},{"length":156,"offset":246,"style":"italic"}],"key":"8c1nf","text":"The total volume of isolated islets is generally expressed as an islet equivalent or 'IEQ,' defined as an islet of 150-μm diameter. This helps to normalize downstream measurements, accounting for the fact that smaller islets contain fewer cells. As such, if islets are on the smaller side, 20 IEQ will consist of \u003e20 individual islets; if islets are larger, 20 IEQ may consist of \u003c20 individual islets.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4p4cs","text":"Once islet aliquots have been distributed to wash wells, place the 12-well plate onto the stereomicroscope stage, swirl the plate to move islets to center of each well, and transfer the islets into the subsequent incubation wells. Use no more than 20 µL media for the transfer to avoid dilution of culture media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"49lek","text":"Cover the 12-well plate and place in   incubator with 5% CO2 for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":59,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":37,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":65,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3d0qi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dhtl","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"erjov","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"F60B942056EB11ECA2CDE7C7E90CDC3A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":4200,"guid":"EDA1873056DD11ECA2CDE7C7E90CDC3A","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6ro50","text":"The first 10 minutes of the incubation are designated as \"warm-up\" time, so this protocol is considered a 1-hour incubation.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ag42f","text":"Remove plate from incubator and place on ice to cool down for  . During this time, label two 2-mL microcentrifuge tubes for each incubation well (islet aliquot): the first for islet extract and the second for media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":62,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"5E2C48A75E1911EC81990A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"am423","text":"Following the   incubation in step 17, spin down islet extract tubes for   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":14,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":73,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":78,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":86400,"guid":"5BF55C505E1A11ECB7176F50E9513153","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"82A9894056DE11ECA2CDE7C7E90CDC3A","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"3000","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"852BC75056DE11ECA2CDE7C7E90CDC3A","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":1324}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6lc0i","text":"Perform hormone assay of your choice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4otsn","text":"Using an electronic pipette and an inverted microscope, transfer islets from overnight incubation plate (step 6) into the 6-cm plate with DMEM media. Islets will be picked from this plate and placed into the 12-well static incubation plate described in steps 9-10.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4k8uq","text":"Remove supernatant from islet pellets, and add 200 µL acid ethanol to each tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":54,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2t4rt","text":"Transfer islet extract tubes to   to begin incubation for  . Meanwhile, proceed to step 18.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":32,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":58,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"F801DC585E1911EC81990A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":86400,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"F801DD065E1911EC81990A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}
